item.description:
Saturday, February 20, 2010 at 7:30 p.m., Come to Divi Zheni's 10th Anniversary Celebration at the Payson Park Church, Belmont, Massachusetts. Enjoy a fabulous evening of song & dance with special musical guests Zornitsa, Pajdashi and Zdravets! A craft show, silent auction and participatory dance make it a non-stop Balkan party to remember! Concert from 7:30-8, dance party until 11 p.m. 365 Belmont Street, Belmont, MA 02478. Tatiana Sarbinska, Bulgaria's renowned diva leads the group. Tickets: $15, $10 seniors and students include refreshments.

Come celebrate our 10th birthday with us! This will be a big party with current and former Divi Zheni members, and featuring much music-making by Divi Zheni, Zornitsa, Pajdashi, and Zdravets! There will be food & drink! There'll be a silent auction! Crafts will be for sale! Woohoo!
item.name: Divi Zheni Bulgarian Women's Chorus Tenth Anniversary Party
